Title: The Unknown Wine List
Text:
In Ragunna, becoming a lover of spirits is far easier than steering clear of them.
Every recipe holds a tale, and every tale is traded for a drink. You'll always find something that speaks to your soulâ€”if you can decipher the "codes" of wine.

*What follows is an exclusive selection of wines from Montelli
*Drinks and Descriptions

"Blues Hour"
Hey, I've got a deal to talk about with you, but we must wait till the night falls to bring it up.

"Crimson Mambo"
A burning pain, a spreading warmth, and numbed senses.
You're not battling colossal beasts but waging war against life's tribulations.
Raise your glass to our hero; at least you've earned this toast.

"Golden Years"
The past has undergone a long fermentation, turning into this sweet, lingering, taste in your throat.
Speechless, you sign and then take another sip, reminiscing the good old days that will never return.
In moments like these, I'm the best listener you could ever have.

"The Rules of Silence"
The very first rule that all Montelli members must adhere to, something etched in their bones and blood, as cherished and unshakable as their beloved families.
Alas, you've ordered this; it seems someone needs a "kind" reminder.

*You may have noticed that there are no prices on the menu. Nah-uh, that's no oversight. Here, drinks are measured beyond mere coin.
*At the right moment, with the right person, come see me here. Remember, the bars in Ragunna are forever open to whoever wants to order.
